item.title: Sensex and Nifty Trade Flat Amid Mixed Sector Performance; HDFC AMC and Nippon Life Ind. Lead Gains
item.description: The Indian equity markets exhibited a subdued session on 18 Dec 2025, with the Sensex and Nifty indices trading marginally lower amid a mixed performance across sectors. While the Nifty IT sector showed resilience, media stocks faced pressure, reflecting a cautious investor sentiment ahead of upcoming corporate results and global cues. Time: 2 hours ago
